snippet.title: Why is it beneficial for yoga practicioners to have an understanding of the history and philosophy
snippet.description: Its always good to know the philosophy. The history of yoga tells you how the yoga evolved

snippet.title: Do you have to have yoga a yoga mat to do yoga
snippet.description: \n . No. Most people use it because it is more comfortable but you can do it anywhere where there is ground or a flat surface without a mat. You could use a carpet, a blanket, or just the floor.

snippet.title: What is the history of history
snippet.description: The first recorded history is probably cavemen drawings, anything before that can only be known

snippet.title: What does history history history history mean
snippet.description: Chronological record of events and their causes as seen by a person view. Who has the benefit of being able to look back and say this is what they think happened.

snippet.title: How do you do yoga
snippet.description: There are several different types of yoga. My suggestion would be to start out doing a Hatha Yoga
